component.title: AWS Simple Email Service
component.description: The aws-ses component is used for sending emails with Amazon's SES service.
component.label: cloud,mail

amazonSESClient.description: To use the AmazonSimpleEmailService as the client

amazonSESEndpoint.description: The region with which the AWS-SES client wants to work with.

proxyHost.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the SQS client

proxyPort.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the SQS client

replyToAddresses.description: List of reply-to email address(es) for the message override it using 'CamelAwsSesReplyToAddresses' header.

returnPath.description: The email address to which bounce notifications are to be forwarded override it using 'CamelAwsSesReturnPath' header.

subject.description: The subject which is used if the message header 'CamelAwsSesSubject' is not present.

to.description: List of destination email address. Can be overriden with 'CamelAwsSesTo' header.

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
